channel.title: Welcome on OBMAN.BOT Help Center
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on OBMAN.BOT Help Center

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
This section is intended for users who wish to selfhost OBMAN.BOT, either for development purposes or because they just want to run the bot on their own hardware.

Support Disclaimer

Whilst the OBMAN.BOT team (attempts to) provides documentation for this endeavour, please note that only a handful actually selfhosts the bot—therefore, we’re unable to provide extensive support. That is to say, unless you can reproduce an issue on the officially hosted instance, you’re on your own resolving it.
